title: VIEW: Cues on the critical need to support India’s solar and renewable energy industry
description: NDA 3.0 aims to revitalize India’s economy with a focus on clean energy in the 2024-25 budget. Priorities include policy continuity, fiscal incentives, and significant investments in renewable technologies, particularly solar. By allocating 5-10% of GDP to clean energy, India can foster economic growth, employment, and global leadership in renewable energy.
